document.full_text: nick palmieri scored twice and the united states scored four third-period goals to beat norway 4-2 on monday and advance to the second round of the ice hockey world championship.
document.title: u.s. rallies to beat norway 4-2 at ice hockey worlds
lines_and_colors: nick palmieri scored twice and the united states scored four third-period goals to beat norway 4-2 on monday and advance to the second round of the ice hockey world championship.
